name: Pet the Puppy Simulator
description:
GAME

This cute puppy is just begging you to pet it 24/7, so why not fulfill it's adorable request? 

INSTRUCTIONS 

Tap the puppy to pet it. Click more to get upgrades, and get the high score of most clicks ever to become the ultimate puppy lover! 

CREDITS 

Art and code by flyingfish

Music distributed to Scratch by Forever_peach

Made with Scratch
